title.narrative: EVIDENCE BASED PLANNING AND QA

description.narrative: Relevant MDAs undertake evidence-based planning, management and quality assurance at national, district, ward and school levels, which contributes to Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Improved learning outcomes and equitable and inclusive education

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Relevant MDAs undertake evidence-based planning, management and quality assurance at national, district, ward and school levels

description.narrative: Strategic support to the sector led to improved school management practices in 800 schools through the certificate in educational leadership and management training. Plans are underway for expanded coverage through open and distance learning both on mainland and Zanzibar. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:04/08/2016
